wikitext.*:
{{disambig-two|the lenited [[Noldorin]]/[[Sindarin]] suffix|the word meaning "land"|[[dôr]]}}
'''-dor''' is a [[Sindarin]] suffix,<ref>{{L|347}}, p. 427</ref> meaning "king, lord".<ref>{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://eldamo.org/content/words/word-2520265131.html|articlename=S. ''-dor'' suf.|website=Eldamo|accessed=15 October 2022}}</ref> As seen in earlier [[Noldorin]], the word is actually '''''taur''''',<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, entries "KHŌ-N", "TĀ"</ref> but only the [[Lenition|lenited]] form is seen in examples.

==Examples==
*''[[Arador|Ara'''dor''']]'' = "Noble lord"
*''[[Celebrindor|Celebrin'''dor''']]'' = "Silver lord"
*''[[Gildor|Gil'''dor''']]'' = "Star lord"
*''[[Gwindor|Gwin'''dor''']]'' = "New lord"
*''[[Meneldor|Menel'''dor''']]'' = "Lord of the Heavens"
*''[[Thorondor|Thoron'''dor''']]'' = "King of Eagles"
